ComicInfo.Summary: We're out to top last year's annual, and with a line-up like this issue we can't miss: Concrete by Paul Chadwick, The American by Mark Verheiden, Race of Scorpions by Leopoldo Duranona, Dead Face by Eddie Campbell, Zone by Michael Kraiger, Bob the Alien by Rich Rice, Wacky Squirrel by Jim Bradrick, and Delia and Celia by Gary Davis!
ComicInfo.Tags: Larry Munro,Bob the Alien,Zone (Dark Horse),Maureen Vonnegut,Concrete,Bacchus,Wacky Squirrel
ComicInfo.Title: My Dinner with the American; Down, Down and Down; Steppin' Out; Visible Breath; A God and His Dog; Zone (Part II); Part Three: The Rusty Soldier
